import React from 'react'; import styles from "./Arrange.module.css" const Arrange = () => { let content = null; if (showAddress){ content = <>
setAddress(e.target.value)} value={address}/> setFloor(e.target.value)} value={floor}/> setIntercom(e.target.value)} value={intercom}/>
} return (
{content}
) } export default Arrange;
